properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 1:57PM EST until February 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Windsor County.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Difficult travel
conditions could impact the morning commute on Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some mix with light freezing drizzle or
light rain will be possible during the daylight hours on
Thursday.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
